name: Partial Recall
description:
Congratulations!!! You have been selected as the lucky winner of KillCo&Co's first and only free lifetime subscription to our EasyArms® service.

Enjoy unlimited one use weapons straight out of your preferred hyperspace compatible backpack, we are tremendously.....BZBZZTBZTZTTT.....&#@%#!

We apologize for the previous message, you wrongly received it due to a technical issue. But not to worry! the marketing department has been purged and we are taking steps to fix the issue.

Our agents are on their way over to do a quick painless product recall, your compliance will be much appreciated.

Attacking our agents will be considered very bad manners and will be noted on your account so please avoid doing so if possible especially using the unlimited weapons you were conveniently provided.

  • Grab weapons from behind your shoulders
  • Weapons will break after one use
  • Defuse Bomb-cats® and collect cash enemies drop
  • Dodge or slash enemy bullets and make it to the end of the bridge alive
  • Time will slow down when an enemy bullet is close enough or you can trigger it manually by pressing the A button.

Tested on an oculus quest 2.
